name: superordinate
content:
superordinate noun [C]
(CLASSIFICATION)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a type, title, or category that includes a group of things within or under it: a hierarchy of rules grouped under various superordinates
language
  specialized a word whose meaning includes a group of other words: "Pet" is a superordinate of "dog" and "cat".

superordinate noun [C]
(SUPERIOR)
a person who has a more important position in an organization than others: the relationship between subordinates and superordinates Compare
